verses.name: Psalms 59:6
verses.text: They return at evening: they make a noise like a dog, and go round about the city.

verses.name: Psalms 59:7
verses.text: Behold, they belch out with their mouth: swords are in their lips: for who, say they, doth hear?

verses.name: Psalms 59:8
verses.text: But thou, O Lord, shalt laugh at them; thou shalt have all the heathen in derision.

verses.name: Psalms 59:9
verses.text: Because of his strength will I wait upon thee: for God is my defence.

verses.name: Psalms 59:10
verses.text: The God of my mercy shall prevent me: God shall let me see my desire upon mine enemies.
